body:
On Jun 16, 2012, at 18:08 , Santiago Pastorino wrote:

> @zenspider hey Ryan, are you trying to fix something in particular?. That dependencies are already listed in railties' gemspec.

```
2428 % gem env version
1.8.17
2429 % ruby -v
ruby 1.8.7 (2011-12-28 patchlevel 357) [universal-darwin11.0]
2430 % gem i -i xxx rails --no-rdoc --no-ri | egrep "rdoc|rake"
2431 % GEM_HOME=xxx GEM_PATH=xxx xxx/bin/rails new blah
/Library/Ruby/Site/1.8/rubygems/dependency.rb:247:in `to_specs': Could not find rake (>= 0.8.7) amongst [actionmailer-3.2.6, actionpack-3.2.6, activemodel-3.2.6, activerecord-3.2.6, activeresource-3.2.6, activesupport-3.2.6, arel-3.0.2, builder-3.0.0, bundler-1.1.4, erubis-2.7.0, hike-1.2.1, i18n-0.6.0, journey-1.0.4, json-1.7.3, mail-2.4.4, mime-types-1.18, multi_json-1.3.6, polyglot-0.3.3, rack-1.4.1, rack-cache-1.2, rack-ssl-1.3.2, rack-test-0.6.1, rails-3.2.6, railties-3.2.6, sprockets-2.1.3, thor-0.15.2, tilt-1.3.3, treetop-1.4.10, tzinfo-0.3.33] (Gem::LoadError)
	from /Library/Ruby/Site/1.8/rubygems/specification.rb:772:in `activate_dependencies'
	from /Library/Ruby/Site/1.8/rubygems/specification.rb:761:in `each'
	from /Library/Ruby/Site/1.8/rubygems/specification.rb:761:in `activate_dependencies'
	from /Library/Ruby/Site/1.8/rubygems/specification.rb:745:in `activate'
	from /Library/Ruby/Site/1.8/rubygems.rb:1211:in `gem'
	from xxx/bin/rails:18
```
